snippet.title: Bladebound Launch Trailer (mobile action RPG)
snippet.description:
MOBILE ACTION RPG TRAILER

Darkness has come all over the kingdom of Ezura. The merciless Betrayer shattered the last men and started a strong-arm régime. You, the last of the Bladebound, are the only hope for bringing back the light and becoming a hero. Embark on the final battle with the mysterious Sentinel and defeat the evil once and for all!

DOWNLOAD NOW
* Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/gp/mas/dl/android?p=com.artifexmundi.balefire 
* iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/bladebound/id1198507229 
* Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.artifexmundi.balefire
